name: ABC Music Notation
author: plylrnsdy
description: Use ABC music notation in codeblock.

name: Callout
author: plylrnsdy
description: Support Obsidian-like Callout `> [!type]`.

name: Codeblock Copy Button
author: plylrnsdy
description: Add a copy button to each codeblock's top-right corner.

name: Codeblock Highlight Mapper
author: plylrnsdy
description: Map language A to language B for highlighting it.

name: Collapsible Section
author: plylrnsdy
description: Fold/unfold markdown section. Supports Heading, Nested list, Codeblock, Table, Quoteblock, Callout.

name: Code Folding
author: plylrnsdy
description: Make your codes foldable.

name: Dark Mode
author: plylrnsdy
description: General dark mode for any theme.

name: File Icon
author: plylrnsdy
description: Show different icon for different file type in file tree.

name: Footnotes
author: plylrnsdy
description: Footnote marker suggestion & Re-index the numerical footnotes.

name: Front Matter
author: plylrnsdy
description: Auto edit front matter, support created-time & updated-time.

name: Image Location
author: plylrnsdy
description: Resolve image's location relative to vault's root.

name: Image Viewer
author: plylrnsdy
description: View all the images in the current Markdown.

name: Markmap
author: plylrnsdy
description: Use Markmap in Typora.

name: Note Refactor
author: plylrnsdy
description: Extract selection to new file.

name: Note Snippets
author: plylrnsdy
description: Use slash command to autocomplete note snippets.

name: Tag
author: plylrnsdy
description: Support tag like `#tag`.

name: Templater
author: plylrnsdy
description: Create note by templater.

name: WaveDrom
author: plylrnsdy
description: Use WaveDrom in Typora

name: Wiki Link
author: plylrnsdy
description: Support wikilink like `[[wikilink]]`.

name: Markdown Padding
author: SukiEva
description: Format Markdown content with padding.
